docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: Welcome to the Amazon AWS Best Practices Guide. The purpose of this guide is to provide prescriptive guidance for leveraging Amazon IAM policy hardening.

docs.title: How to use this guide
docs.text:
The topics do not need to be read in a particular order:

  • IAM-Policy
  • Getting started
    • Condition
    • Tag
